Interface ProjectStateUpdate


  • public interface ProjectStateUpdate
    Interface to update MainWin depending on the assigned projects and the currently active project

    • Method Detail

      • enableProjectActions

        void enableProjectActions(boolean isCompile,
                          boolean isRun,
                          boolean isBuild)
        Enables or disables to compile, run and build a project. The specified booleans each are true to enable, false to disable
        Parameters:
        isCompile - the boolean for compile actions
        isRun - the boolean for run actions
        isBuild - the boolean for build actions

      • enableAssignProject

        void enableAssignProject(boolean b)
        Enables or disables to assign a project
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable

      • enableOpenSettingsWin

        void enableOpenSettingsWin(boolean b)
        Enables or disables to open the project settings window
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable

      • enableChangeProject

        void enableChangeProject(boolean b)
        Enables or disables to change project
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable

      • setBuildLabel

        void setBuildLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Sets a label text in the menu item for build actions
        Parameters:
        label - the label

      • displayProjectName

        void displayProjectName(java.lang.String projName,
                        java.lang.String projType)
        Displays the project name and type in the status bar
        Parameters:
        projName - the name of the project
        projType - the type of project
